product_name: Klean Kanteen Classic Water Bottle with Sport Cap - 27 fl. oz. - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The rugged 27 fl. oz. Klean Kanteen Classic water bottle with sport cap is a great companion on bike rides, workout sessions and adventures in the mountains. Bottle is made of tough 18/8 food-grade stainless steel that is BPA free and unlined. Painted exterior is an acrylic, resin-based finish that is totally free of lead and other toxins (hand washing is recommended for painted bottles). Sport Cap 3.0 polypropylene cap design has a 25% higher flow rate than the previous version; valve won't chirp or whistle while you sip. Bottle mouth is wide enough to accept ice cubes. Clip a carabiner (not included) to the loop on the sport cap and attach the bottle to a backpack or belt loop. Slim design fits neatly in standard sport bottle carriers and most bicycle bottle cages. Klean Kanteen Classic Water Bottle with Sport Cap is not 100% leakproof, so keep bottle upright when possible. Please note: This Klean Kanteen is single walled and is not intended for use with hot liquids. Closeout.
